HYPActivationGestureOptions

enum HYPActivationGestureOptions {}

Supported gestures to activate Hyperion.

  • HYPActivationGestureTwoFingerDoubleTap

    Represents a two finger double tap gesture.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    HYPActivationGestureTwoFingerDoubleTap = 1 << 0
    Show on GitHub
  • HYPActivationGestureThreeFingerSingleTap

    Represents a three finger single tap gesture.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    HYPActivationGestureThreeFingerSingleTap = 1 << 1
    Show on GitHub
  • HYPActivationGestureRightEdgeSwipe

    Represents a right edge swipe gesture.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    HYPActivationGestureRightEdgeSwipe = 1 << 2
    Show on GitHub
  • HYPActivationGestureShake

    Represents a shake gesture.

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    HYPActivationGestureShake = 1 << 3
    Show on GitHub
